dialogue:
There are strong forces in these lands. Forces that I cannot describe. I've recieved reports of a temple in the lands west of us. I believe these forces are emanating from that temple. I want you to travel there and bring me back whatever it is that's calling us.
There are forces at play here beyond our understanding. I need to know what's in that temple.
